drawingPrompts: Create an abstract representation of your favorite emotion using only lines and shapes.
Draw a cityscape at sunset with long, dramatic shadows.
Illustrate a futuristic vehicle that doesn't exist yet.
Combine two unrelated objects into a single, imaginative creature.
Sketch a detailed portrait of a fictional character from your favorite book.
Draw a landscape using only your non-dominant hand for added challenge.
Create a visual representation of a song or piece of music.
Illustrate a scene from a dream you remember, focusing on surreal elements.
Draw a self-portrait using only geometric shapes.
Imagine a new species of plant or flower and illustrate it with intricate details.
Draw a detailed representation of your favorite place in nature.

Draw a still life of your favorite snacks or treats.

Create a visual representation of a famous quote or saying.

gestureDescriptions: Reaching for the sky with excitement.
In deep thought, resting chin on hand.
Arms raised in celebration.
Dancing gracefully with flowing movements.
Confidently striding forward with purpose.
Leaning against a wall with a casual pose.
Nervously biting nails.
Jumping in the air with enthusiasm.
Gesturing dramatically while telling a story.
Expressing surprise with wide-open eyes and raised eyebrows.
Holding an umbrella in the rain, shoulders hunched.
Arms crossed, conveying confidence or defiance.
Slouching in a chair with a relaxed posture.
Running with a sense of urgency.
Looking over the shoulder with a suspicious expression.
With hands on hips, portraying confidence or assertiveness.
With head in hands, expressing despair or frustration.
Pointing in a specific direction with determination.
Covering the mouth in shock or disbelief.
Tiptoeing cautiously as if trying not to be noticed.
With arms outstretched in a welcoming or embracing gesture.
With hands clasped behind the back, lost in thought.
Waving enthusiastically.
Sitting cross-legged in a meditative pose.
Shrugging with an indifferent expression.
Holding a magnifying glass, examining something closely.
Gesturing to keep quiet with a finger over the lips.
With arms outstretched, balancing on one leg.
Presenting an invisible object with a flourish.
With a surprised expression, hands on cheeks.
Holding a large umbrella against a strong wind.
With a thoughtful expression, stroking the chin.
Holding a gift with excitement and anticipation.
Gesturing for someone to come closer.
With hands in pockets, looking casual or relaxed.
With arms folded, tapping foot impatiently.
With arms wrapped around themselves in a self-hug.
Shielding eyes from the sun to get a better look.
Gesturing with both hands in an animated conversation.
Giving a thumbs up with a smile of approval.
Holding binoculars and scanning the horizon.
With hands raised in surrender or defeat.
